page.title: About Ten10
page.subtitle: Information about the application and the team behind it

appInfo.title: About the Application
appInfo.description1: Ten10 is an application for managing income and donations, designed to help you track your income and manage your donations efficiently and conveniently.
appInfo.description2: The application allows you to manage your tithe, track regular donations, and receive reminders when you need to donate.

thanks.title: Thanks
thanks.description: Special thanks to all the contributors and users who help us improve the application and make it better.
